mutants.code:
def calculate_min_cable_length(n, cities):
    result = 1
    lastP = None
    lastB = None
    lastR = None
    maxB = 0
    maxR = 0
    for (idx, city) in enumerate(cities):
        (i, code) = city
        if code == 'B':
            if lastB is not None:
                result += abs(i - lastB)
                maxB = max(maxB, abs(i - lastB))
            lastB = i
        if code == 'R':
            if lastR is not None:
                result += abs(i - lastR)
                maxR = max(maxR, abs(i - lastR))
            lastR = i
        if code == 'P':
            if lastB is not None:
                result += abs(i - lastB)
                maxB = max(maxB, abs(i - lastB))
            if lastR is not None:
                result += abs(i - lastR)
                maxR = max(maxR, abs(i - lastR))
            if lastP is not None:
                result += min(0, abs(i - lastP) - maxB - maxR)
            maxB = 0
            maxR = 0
            lastB = i
            lastR = i
            lastP = i
    return result

def calculate_min_cable_length(n, cities):
    result = -1
    lastP = None
    lastB = None
    lastR = None
    maxB = 0
    maxR = 0
    for (idx, city) in enumerate(cities):
        (i, code) = city
        if code == 'B':
            if lastB is not None:
                result += abs(i - lastB)
                maxB = max(maxB, abs(i - lastB))
            lastB = i
        if code == 'R':
            if lastR is not None:
                result += abs(i - lastR)
                maxR = max(maxR, abs(i - lastR))
            lastR = i
        if code == 'P':
            if lastB is not None:
                result += abs(i - lastB)
                maxB = max(maxB, abs(i - lastB))
            if lastR is not None:
                result += abs(i - lastR)
                maxR = max(maxR, abs(i - lastR))
            if lastP is not None:
                result += min(0, abs(i - lastP) - maxB - maxR)
            maxB = 0
            maxR = 0
            lastB = i
            lastR = i
            lastP = i
    return result
